item.title: Starry Night
item.description: You’re in! Nice. We’ve put together a little post to introduce you to the Ghost editor and get you started. Go ahead and edit this post to get going and learn how it all works! Getting Started Writing in markdown is really easy. In the left hand panel of Ghost, you simply write as you normally would. Where appropriate, you can use formatting shortcuts to style your content. For example, a list:
